meanings.definition: A person or thing that flattens.
meanings.sent1: The steamroller is a powerful flattener of the road.
meanings.sent2: The iron is a handy flattener for removing wrinkles from clothes.
meanings.sent3: The pancake flattener decided to take a break and relax on a fluffy pillow.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a flattener, smoothing out any bumps in the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The giant flattener machine roared to life, ready to level the ground.

meanings.definition: A substance used to make something flat or smooth.
meanings.sent1: The paint thinner acted as a flattener, ensuring a smooth finish on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The sandpaper was the perfect flattener for the rough wooden surface.
meanings.sent3: The cake decorator accidentally used salt instead of sugar, turning it into a flattener of taste.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a flattener, smoothing out any rough edges in their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The flattener spray magically transformed the wrinkled paper into a flat canvas.
